question:
Consider the following statements about the Deen Dayal SPARSH Yojana:
  1. It is an initiative by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
  2. Under this scheme, the government provides free medical check-up along with health insurance policy to Divyangs
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. The Deen Dayal SPARSH Yojana is an initiative by Ministry of Communication. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. SPARSH here stands for Scholarship for Promotion of Aptitude & Research in Stamps as a Hobby. The programme aims to provide an annual scholarship to students of class VI, VII. VIII, IX having a good academic record and also pursuing Philately as a hobby through a competitive selection process in all postal circles. Total of 40 scholarships in every postal circle is to be given such that10 students each from Standard VI, VII, VIII & IX. The amount of Scholarship will be Rs. 6000/-per annum.
